mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (userid, pno, cartstock) VALUES (#{userid}, #{pno}, #{cartstock})
mapper.select: select c.cno as cno, c.userid as userid, s.pno as pno, u.userid as userid, c.cartstock as cartstock, s.title as title, s.detail as detail, s.price as price, (price * cartstock) money from GH_User u, S_product s, cart c where u.userid = c.userid and s.pno = c.pno and c.userid = #{userid} order by c.cno

select w.wno as wno, w.userid as userid, s.pno as pno, u.userid as userid, s.title as title, s.detail as detail, s.price as price from GH_User u, S_product s, wish w where u.userid = w.userid and s.pno = w.pno and w.userid = #{userid} order by w.wno
